appName.description: Name of the extension as displayed in settings

appDesc.message: Bloquear el accesso a sitios web maliciosos desde el navegador.
appDesc.description: Description of the extension as displayed in settings

dbgNoServer.message: No se ha especificado la URL del servidor
dbgNoServer.description: Debug message to show when no server URL is defined

dbgSavedItems.description: Debug message outlining how many indicators were wrote to local storage

dbgAddIndicator.message: $count$ Se enviaron indicadores a la nube.
dbgAddIndicator.description: Debug message outlining how many indicators were sent to the cloud

dbgProcessedEvents.message: Los eventos han sido procesados y limpiados localmente.
dbgProcessedEvents.description: Debug message after processing local event alerts

dbgNotificationCreated.description: Debug message after creating a notification

dbgEnabed.description: Debug message shown when extension is enabled

dbgDisabled.description: Debug message shown when extension is disabled

dbgBlockBypass.description: Debug message when a user requests to bypass blocking

dbgRawRequest.description: Debug message showing the raw request that was flagged as malicious

optionsOn.description: Value to display when a specific option is enabled

optionsOff.description: Value to display when a specific option is disabled

optionsServerUrl.description: Label for the server URL option input

optionsAnalystAssist.description: Label for the analyst assist option

optionsDebugMode.description: Label for the debug mode option

optionsConfigSaved.description: Message to show when the configuration is saved

optionsSaveConfig.description: Label to save the options configuration

optionsServerUrlTooltip.message: URL del servidor para procesar indicadores de actividad sospechosa o maliciosa
optionsServerUrlTooltip.description: Tooltip data that shows up next to the option label

optionsShowNotificationsTooltip.message: Mostrar alertas cuando un evento malicioso es detectado
optionsShowNotificationsTooltip.description: Tooltip data that shows up next to the option label

optionsAnalystAssistTooltip.message: Enviar eventos maliciosos directamente a un analista para identificar más detalles del ataque
optionsAnalystAssistTooltip.description: Tooltip data that shows up next to the option label

optionsDebugModeTooltip.message: Ejecutar el plugin con toda la salida hacia la consola
optionsDebugModeTooltip.description: Tooltip data that shows up next to the option label

notifyIndicatorSyncTitle.message: Se actualizó la base de datos de indicadores!
notifyIndicatorSyncTitle.description: Title of the notification window when the database updates.

notifyRequestError.message: La petición a $url$ ha devuelto el estado $status$
notifyRequestError.description: Message to display inside of the notification when a request for data fails

notifyRequestErrorTitle.description: Title of the notification window when a request for data fails

notifyAlertTitle.description: Title of the notification window when a malicious event is detected

notifyAlertMessage.message: $hostname$ ha efectuado una petición $method$ de tipo $type$.
notifyAlertMessage.description: Message to display inside of the notification when a malicious event is detected

notifyStatusAlertTitle.description: Title of the notification window when Blockade is turned on or off

warningProceedMessage.message: Asumo el riesgo, dame acceso temporal
warningProceedMessage.description: Hyperlink label displayed that allows a user to access a malicious resource

warningLeaveMessage.description: Hyperlink label displayed to take a user away from the malicious resource

warningAlertTitle.description: Main label to display to the user when they visit a malicious resource

warningAlertMessage.message: El bloqueo ha identificado $url$ como sospechosa. Este sitio web puede estar engañando a los usuarios para realizar una acción peligrosa, como instalar software o revelar información personal (por ejemplo contraseñas, números de teléfono o tarjetas de crédito). Examina los detalles.
warningAlertMessage.description: Detailed message shown to the user when they visit a malicious resource
